sentences.english: Drinking tea with honey is good for our health.
You have bees to thank every time you drizzle some honey into your tea.
sentences.chinese: 每次在茶中滴入蜂蜜时你都要感谢蜜蜂的馈赠。

sentences.english: Differential effects of honey, sucrose, and fructose on blood sugar levels(Shambaugh et al. , 1990)
sentences.chinese: 蜂蜜，蔗糖，果糖对血糖水平的影响。

sentences.english: He will eat curds and honey when he knows enough to reject the wrong and choose the right.
sentences.chinese: 到他晓得弃恶择善的时候，他必吃奶油与蜂蜜。

sentences.english: But honey is not the stickiest issue dividing the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 但是蜂蜜并非导致两国产生分歧的最大问题。

sentences.english: Is the pure nature honey slightly difficult to have to distinguish how to distinguish the fake honey out?
sentences.chinese: 纯天然蜂蜜与掺假蜂蜜很难区别吗？

sentences.english: Is the pure nature honey slightly difficult to have to distinguish how to distinguish the fake honey out?
sentences.chinese: 纯天然蜂蜜与掺假蜂蜜很难区别吗？

sentences.english: Drambuie ---- a strong sweet alcoholic drink from Scotland made with whisky and herbs.
sentences.chinese: 杜林标酒，苏格兰威士忌，蜂蜜香酒。

sentences.english: Delicately fragranced with Almond Flowers and Honey.
sentences.chinese: 散发淡淡的清香与杏仁花和蜂蜜。

sentences.english: Make honey water by mixing one teaspoon of honey in two cups of warm water.
sentences.chinese: 两杯温水混合一茶匙的蜂蜜蜂蜜水。

sentences.english: Make honey water by mixing one teaspoon of honey in two cups of warm water.
sentences.chinese: 两杯温水混合一茶匙的蜂蜜蜂蜜水。

sentences.english: 'Cos I've got a lot of honey on my nice new nose.
sentences.chinese: 因为我有很多蜂蜜，粘在我漂亮的小鼻头。

sentences.english: Our sour taste can be sweetened with a little honey for those that prefer it.
sentences.chinese: 对喜欢的人来说，我们的酸味可以用一些蜂蜜来加甜。

sentences.english: Making a tea of a half-teaspoonful of turmeric and some honey to sweeten works well, too.
sentences.chinese: 放半匙姜黄和一些蜂蜜的甜茶也有很好的效果。

sentences.english: Heart disease: - When eating breakfast, coat your bread with honey and cinnamon.
sentences.chinese: 早餐定期吃涂有蜂蜜和肉桂粉的面包。

sentences.english: For a treat, I like to feast on wild honey and bees.
sentences.chinese: 要是想犒劳一下自己，我喜欢享用野蜂蜜和蜜蜂。
